nodes.text: Putting Saddam Hussein on trial will be complicated but it has to be done
You don't build respect for the rule of law by choosing to kill someone no matter how heinous their crimes because it's the easier thing to do.
The trial is positive under the point of view of civic education
The goal of Human RIghts Watch is to build respect for the rule of law
The trial is opposite to execution under the point of view of respect of the law
The choice of killing someone is negative under the point of view of civic education
